name: SG Analytics
description: A Global Insights and Analytics company that focuses on ESG, Data Analytics, and Investment & Market Research services. With a team of over 1200, the company has a presence in New York, London, Zurich, Seattle, Austin, San Francisco, Toronto, and delivery centres in Pune, Bengaluru, and Hyderabad. The data analytics ecosystem at SG Analytics’ is built upon four strong pillars of data and analytics strategy and insights.
Headline: Harnessing Data with Purpose
ShortDescription: A Global Insights and Analytics company that focuses on ESG, Data Analytics, and Investment & Market Research services.

Highlights.name: Collaborate
Highlights.description: We're the pioneers in bringing together research, technology & analytics, using our domain expertise to create valuable and reliable insights.

Highlights.name: Invest In The Future
Highlights.description: We use information as an artistic tool to capture trends and insights to find differentiated solutions.

Highlights.name: We Believe Life's Possible
Highlights.description: We believe that the best things in life are achieved easily with ease and grace

enhanced_description: SG Analytics is a global insights and analytics company specializing in ESG, Data Analytics, and Investment & Market Research services. With a team of over 1200 professionals and a global presence including offices in New York, London, Zurich, Seattle, Austin, San Francisco, Toronto, and delivery centers in Pune, Bengaluru, and Hyderabad, the company leverages its expertise in research, technology, and analytics to provide valuable and reliable insights. Their data analytics ecosystem is founded on four pillars of data and analytics strategy and insights, aiming to harness data with purpose and find differentiated solutions. SG Analytics also focuses on improving employee happiness and engagement through its offerings.
key_use_cases: Strategic consulting for data and analytics
Implementing robotic process automation (RPA) for various business processes
competitive_advantages: Global reach and extensive team (over 1200 professionals across 10+ locations)
Pioneering integration of research, technology, and analytics
Deep domain expertise for valuable and reliable insights
Focus on delivering differentiated solutions by capturing trends and insights
integration_capabilities: HCM Systems (e.g., HCM TEST2, Test HCM B)
roi_benefits: Access to valuable and reliable insights for strategic advantage
